name: CreateSpendProgram
description:
Create a spend program to manage expenses.

This tool is used to create a new spend program, helping in organizing and managing expenses. It should be called when there is a need to set up a structured spending plan.

parameters.name: spend_program_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details such as description, display name, icon, shareability, issuance rules, card issuance preference, spend types, and restrictions for the spend program.

display_name.description: Display name of the spend program.

icon.description: The template icon for the spend program.

is_shareable.description: Dictates whether the spend program is shareable among multiple users.

issuance_rules.description: Spend Program Issuance Rules can be set for requests or default issuance of Limits from a program. Set whether a program is requestable or issued by default for a given set of users and their attributes (department, locations, and custom fields). If you'd like to give these permissions to all employees, you can set `applies_to_all` to `True`. Feel free to ignore this if you don't want any custom requestability or issuance logic.

issue_physical_card_if_needed.description: Dictates whether the spend program should issue a physical card if the user does not have one.

permitted_spend_types.description: Specifies the permitted spend types for the spend program.

spending_restrictions.description: A set of restrictions imposed on the spend program.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ramp API.

If you'd like to give these permissions to all employees, you can set `applies_to_all` to `True`. Feel free to ignore this if you don't want any custom requestability or issuance logic.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
